short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to brows only with your keyboard. Press '.' and required chars to jump to link. Press 'n' or 'p' to scroll down or up.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Navigation with keyboard. 
Press "." to view links and their character combination to open the link.
The "n"-key is used to scroll down, where the "p"-key is used to scroll up. (Emacs navigation)
Use the "b"-key to jump back in the tab history and the "f"-key to jump forwars in the tab history.

tiny convenience project. I am open to suggestions!
